text: Oscar dos Santos Emboaba Júnior (; born 9 September 1991), known as Oscar, is an Brazilian football player. He plays as an attacking midfielder for Shanghai Port, who is also the captain. He is known for his dribbling and playmaking skills. Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from São Paulo (state) Category:Association football midfielders
title: Oscar (footballer, born 1991)
